dcterms:description: FaceScape contains 16,940 human head models captured from 847 subjects performing 20 different expressions. The models are originally 3D meshes with high-resolution texture maps, and the dataset is used for training CU-Net for point cloud color upsampling.
dcterms:title: FaceScape

dcterms:creator: Maja KrivokuÄ‡a

dcterms:description: The MPEG 8i dataset contains 6 voxelized point cloud models, which are used to evaluate CU-Net for color upsampling tasks at various ratios.
dcterms:title: MPEG 8i
